action.name: Decipher Writing
action.comment: You attempt to decipher complicated writing or literature on an obscure topic.

action.name: EARN INCOME
action.comment: You use one of your skills to make money during downtime.

action.name: IDENTIFY MAGIC
action.comment: Once you discover that an item, location, or ongoing effect is magical, you can spend 10 minutes to try to identify the particulars of its magic.

action.name: LEARN A SPELL
action.comment: You can gain access to a new spell of your tradition from someone who knows that spell or from magical writing like a spellbook or scroll.

action.name: RECALL KNOWLEDGE
action.comment: The following skills can be used to Recall Knowledge, getting information about the listed topics.

action.name: SUBSIST
action.comment: You try to provide food and shelter for yourself, and possibly others as well, with a standard of living.

action.name: BALANCE
action.comment: You move across a narrow surface or uneven ground.

action.name: TUMBLE THROUGH
action.comment: You Stride up to your Speed. During this movement, you can try to move through the space of one enemy.

action.name: MANEUVER IN FLIGHT
action.comment: You try a difficult maneuver while flying.

action.name: SQUEEZE
action.comment: You contort yourself to squeeze through a space so small you can barely fit through.

action.name: BORROW AN ARCANE SPELL
action.comment: If you’re an arcane spellcaster who prepares from a spellbook, you can attempt to prepare a spell from someone else’s spellbook.

action.name: CLIMB
action.comment: You move up, down, or across an incline.

action.name: FORCE OPEN
action.comment: Using your body, a lever, or some other tool, you attempt to forcefully open a door, window, container or heavy gate. With a high enough result, you can even smash through walls.

action.name: GRAPPLE
action.comment: You attempt to grab a creature or object with your free hand.

action.name: HIGH JUMP
action.comment: You Stride, then make a vertical Leap.

action.name: LONG JUMP
action.comment: You Stride, then make a horizontal Leap.

action.name: SHOVE
action.comment: You push a creature away from you.

action.name: SWIM
action.comment: You propel yourself through water.

action.name: TRIP
action.comment: You try to knock a creature to the ground.

action.name: DISARM
action.comment: You try to knock something out of a creature’s grasp.

action.name: REPAIR
action.comment: You spend 10 minutes attempting to fix a damaged item, placing the item on a stable surface and using the repair kit with both hands.

action.name: CRAFT
action.comment: You can make an item from raw materials.

action.name: IDENTIFY ALCHEMY
action.comment: You can identify the nature of an alchemical item with 10 minutes of testing using alchemist’s tools.

action.name: CREATE A DIVERSION
action.comment: With a gesture, a trick, or some distracting words, you can create a diversion that draws creatures’ attention elsewhere.

action.name: IMPERSONATE
action.comment: You create a disguise to pass yourself off as someone or something you are not.

action.name: LIE
action.comment: You try to fool someone with an untruth.

action.name: FEINT
action.comment: With a misleading flourish, you leave an opponent unprepared for your real attack.

action.name: GATHER INFORMATION
action.comment: You canvass local markets, taverns, and gathering places in an attempt to learn about a specific individual or topic.

action.name: MAKE AN IMPRESSION
action.comment: With at least 1 minute of conversation, during which you engage in charismatic overtures, flattery, and other acts of goodwill, you seek to make a good impression on someone to make them temporarily agreeable.

action.name: REQUEST
action.comment: You can make a request of a creature that’s friendly or helpful to you. You must couch the request in terms that the target would accept given their current attitude toward you.

action.name: COERCE
action.comment: With threats either veiled or overt, you attempt to bully a creature into doing what you want. You must spend at least 1 minute of conversation with a creature you can see and that can either see or sense you.

action.name: DEMORALIZE
action.comment: With a sudden shout, a well-timed taunt, or a cutting putdown, you can shake an enemy’s resolve.

action.name: ADMINISTER FIRST AID
action.comment: You perform first aid on an adjacent creature that is dying or bleeding.

action.name: TREAT DISEASE
action.comment: You spend at least 8 hours caring for a diseased creature.

action.name: TREAT POISON
action.comment: You treat a patient to prevent the spread of poison.

action.name: TREAT WOUNDS
action.comment: You spend 10 minutes treating one injured living creature.

action.name: COMMAND AN ANIMAL
action.comment: You issue an order to an animal.

action.name: PERFORM
action.comment: When making a brief performance—one song, a quick dance, or a few jokes.

action.name: CREATE FORGERY
action.comment: You create a forged document, usually over the course of a day or a week.

action.name: CONCEAL AN OBJECT
action.comment: You hide a small object on your person (such as a weapon of light Bulk).

action.name: HIDE
action.comment: You huddle behind cover or greater cover or deeper into concealment to become hidden, rather than observed.

action.name: SNEAK
action.comment: You can attempt to move to another place while becoming or staying undetected.

action.name: SENSE DIRECTION
action.comment: Using the stars, the position of the sun, traits of the geography or flora, or the behavior of fauna, you can stay oriented in the wild.

action.name: COVER TRACKS
action.comment: You cover your tracks, moving up to half your travel Speed.

action.name: TRACK
action.comment: You follow tracks, moving at up to half your travel Speed.

action.name: PALM AN OBJECT
action.comment: Palming a small, unattended object without being noticed

action.name: STEAL
action.comment: You try to take a small object from another creature without being noticed.

action.name: DISABLE A DEVICE
action.comment: This action allows you to disarm a trap or another complex device.

action.name: PICK A LOCK
action.comment: Opening a lock without a key

action.name: Grab an Edge
action.comment: reduce the damage from some falls

action.name: Aid
action.prereq_details: An ally is about to use an action that requires a skill check or attack roll. The ally is willing to accept your aid, and you have prepared to help
action.comment: You try to help your ally with a task. To use this reaction, you must first prepare to help, usually by using an action during your turn. You must explain to the GM exactly how you’re trying to help, and they determine whether you can Aid your ally.
action.duration: for preparing aid: usually by using an action during your turn
action.calculations: roll = roll of trigger or decided by the GM

check_critical_success.value: {legendary proficiency: +4; master proficiency: +3; other: +2}, circumstance bonus

action.name: Crawl
action.comment: You move 5 feet by crawling and continue to stay prone.

action.name: Delay
action.comment: You wait for the right moment to act. The rest of your turn doesn’t happen yet. Instead, you’re removed from the initiative order. You can return to the initiative order as a free action triggered by the end of any other creature’s turn. This permanently changes your initiative to the new position. You can’t use reactions until you return to the initiative order.

action.name: Escape
action.comment: You attempt to escape from being grabbed, immobilized, or restrained. Choose one creature, object, spell effect, hazard, or other impediment imposing any of those conditions on you.
action.calculations: dc = {grabbing: athletics; tied up: thievery} dc or spell dc or dc of impediment
